LanguageData.DesignatorCancelChequerDesc: Cancels designations in a chequer pattern.
LanguageData.DesignatorCutPlantsBlightDesc: Cut only plants that are infected with blight.
LanguageData.DesignatorGrowingZoneSameDesc: A grow zone that is restricted to selecting a single soil fertility.
LanguageData.DesignatorReplaceWallDesc: Replace an existing wall with another material.
